column1: # PRESCRIPTIVE ENVELOPE CRITERIA FOR NONRESIDENTIAL BUILDINGS (INCLUDING RELOCATABLE PUBLIC SCHOOL BUILDINGS WHERE MANUFACTURER CERTIFIES USE ONLY IN SPECIFIC CLIMATE ZONE; NOT INCLUDING HIGH-RISE RESIDENTIAL BUILDINGS AND GUEST ROOMS OF HOTEL/MOTEL BUILDINGS)
table:   Opaque Envelope Requirements | Climate Zone 1

column6: Notes
0.75 Thermal Emittance, and 0.63 (low-sloped) or 0.2 (steep-sloped) Aged Solar Reflectance
0.75 Thermal Emittance, and 0.63 (low-sloped) or 0.2 (steep-sloped) Aged Solar Reflectance
Air Barrier - Not Required

column1: Walls Above Grade | Wood Framed and Other

column6: Maximum is an F-Factor.
R-5 vertical insulation from top of slab down 16 inches or to the frost line, whichever is greater.
